content: sock blockers or carefully iron the socks using the first stripe sequence before starting the heel k28 the steam function on knitting jogless stripes it s quite impossible to make the stripes jogless the first st of the round bring it to the left needle especially on the stripes that are just one round and knit it together with the first st of the round before changing the colors again but here are some tips that can make life easier stripes in the round over the 1 round long cc stripes stripes in the round over the 2 rounds long cc stripes and the 4 rounds long mc stripes work the cc stripe as est change to mc and knit 1 round on the next round pick up the first leg of the knit 1 round with the new color on the next round stitch on the round below the first st of the round pick up the first leg of the stitch on the round below bring it to the left needle and knit it together with the first st of the round abbreviations bor beginning of the round rem remain cc contrasting color repeat repeat co cast on rs right side decrease d decreased sl slip dpn double pointed needles sm slip marker k knit ssk slip slip knit the slipped sts together k2tog knit 2 sts together st s stitch es m marker ws wrong side mc main color wyib with yarn in back p purl wyif with yarn in front pm place marker yo yarn over 4 © sari nordlund 2019 for personal use only all rights reserved
